divs: Sighting Detailstubular clouds, lots of aircraft in the area...took 2 still shots, one is uploaded and blown up here... one video of nine seconds, at 2-3 seconds. a bright light flashes across the right of the screen, and turns right..priot to that, there is a light moving erratically in the center of the screen.. the last 2 seconds show a light darting from middle center back up again.
